messages: 0b05dee9e3dc9fb7f20dba513671c07a (02:16): odd issue - when i refresh a page with a form in firefox, the radio buttons change values (often going to the next value). anyone ever see something like this before?
0b05dee9e3dc9fb7f20dba513671c07a (02:17): reisio: i've been googling every way i could think of and found nothin so far, but i'll check those out
235c7d16517a3d035bebf1003975a024 (02:20): i have a site with frames and i would like the main url to be changed if a user clicks on a link inside some framecontent
235c7d16517a3d035bebf1003975a024 (02:20): i guess i could do this with some javascripting but would prefer the html way
62fba5811243f518935848d952809f8c (02:21): That's what XFrames does, which has no real support
62fba5811243f518935848d952809f8c (02:21): The best solution is to not use frames.
235c7d16517a3d035bebf1003975a024 (02:22): i would love to not use frames :) but i'm kinda forced to do so.. or is there any other way to get some content scrollable?

9c9173725d720e1ca77841253cff6d58 (02:23): can you guys help me with this?  I'm trying to get a div put at the bottom of the page, but it seems no matter how I attempt it, it gets placed just a bit too far down, and I end up with a scroll on the side
62fba5811243f518935848d952809f8c (02:23): tj9991: "height=90" is not valid CSS. Remove all margin and padding from body.
9c9173725d720e1ca77841253cff6d58 (02:24): body doesnt have any margins/paddings set
235c7d16517a3d035bebf1003975a024 (02:24): tj9991, doesn't mean they aren't there ;)
62fba5811243f518935848d952809f8c (02:24): tj9991: Then you need to set them. They are not zero by default.
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (02:47): Sjoerd_: I use them sometimes, whta's up
43589a061e4284c94e3e2db72b4c8e58 (02:50): can anyoen give me a link or something on how to use the language setting in html ? so users can see the page in their lang that was setuped in the browser ?
43589a061e4284c94e3e2db72b4c8e58 (02:51): hmm.. as i see i think it's actualy an apache feature and not html
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (02:52): usually you just use index.en.html, iirc
